title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Description: When the key is left blank while adding, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Leave the key blank while adding.
2. Set externalized text in the chart title.
OB: The localization key is left blank while adding.
EB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart when the key is left blank.
SR: Ensure that the externalized text is displayed in the chart title regardless of whether the key is blank or not.
